00022 /**
00023  * @file   DTFactory.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Dec 14 14:12:32 2009
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Wrapper class for all of our DataTransform factories
00028  * 
00029  */
00030 
00031 #ifndef _DTFACTORY_H_
00032 #define _DTFACTORY_H_
00033 
00034 #include <string>
00035 
00036 #include "chipstream/DataTransform.h"
00037 #include "chipstream/ChipStreamFactory.h"
00038 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodFactory.h"
00039 #include "chipstream/PmAdjusterFactory.h"
00040 
00041 /**
00042  * Class for creating DataTransform objects by string description. Usual
00043  * chipstream, pmadjuster and quantmethod string descriptions should work.
00044  * Classes must implement the setParameter() function to be initialized
00045  * properly.
00046  */
00047 class DTFactory {
00048 
00049 public:
00050 
00051   /** 
00052    * @brief Create a pointer to a new DataTransform object as described
00053    * in the string specification.
00054    * @param spec - Specification string i.e. quant-norm.sketch=1000000,
00055    * or med-polish.expon=true, etc.
00056    * 
00057    * @return Pointer to new DataTransform objects, must be deleted when
00058    * finished.
00059    */
00060    DataTransform *dataTransformForString(const std::string &spec, PsBoard &board);
00061 
00062 private: 
00063 
00064   /// When building a ChipStreamDataTransform use this factory for chipstream
00065   ChipStreamFactory m_CSFactory;
00066   /// Legacy factory for building quantification Method factories
00067   QuantMethodFactory m_QMFactory;
00068   /// Legacy factory for build
00069   PmAdjusterFactory m_PmAdjFactory;
00070 
00071 };
00072 
00073 #endif /* _DTFACTORY_H_ */
